name: I REMEMBER NOW
description:
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////13.12.2016/////
 _       ___   ____  _      ____  _      ___   ____  ___       _      ___   _      
| |     | |_) | |_  | |\/| | |_  | |\/| | |_) | |_  | |_)     | |\ | / / \ \ \    /
|_|     |_| \ |_|__ |_|  | |_|__ |_|  | |_|_) |_|__ |_| \     |_| \| \_\_/  \_\/\/

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

This game was proudly made in Ukraine, for Ludum Dare 37 with a theme: "One Room".

A rough day for you - you are trapped in your basement with a pair of burglars,
requesting something from you, as criminals sometimes do.

Listen, see, think. Do you remember now?

Use WSAD + Mouse for movement.
Left click to interact.

You can interact with one object more than once!

//// CREDITS ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Igor Baykov

Kyrylo Rovnyi

Illia Lukianov

Thanks to Beatshapers, Ltd. (http://beatshapers.com)
